item.description: Javascript的语言思想 亮点 函数 Javascript中的函数是具有词法作用域的顶级对象。 JavaScript’s functions are first class objects with (mostly) lexical scoping. Ja

item.title: Self Censorship
item.description: 多年以前，写作是最令我快乐的事，拉上厚窗帘，让文字越过边界，一盏台灯，照亮一个孤独的思想犯。我想在互联网开垦一片地，安放那些无处可去的想法，

item.title: Hello World
item.description: What can I say? This is a markdown demo page. Paragraph Ethereum was proposed in late 2013 by Vitalik Buterin, a cryptocurrency researcher and programmer. Development was funded by an online crowdsale that took place between July and August 2014. he system then went live on 30 July 2015, with 72 million coins minted. This accounts for about 65 percent of the total circulating supply in April 2020. Quote 亦
